description: Numbers n such that 50*R_n + 3 is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comments: Also numbers n such that (5*10^(n+1)-23)/9 is prime.a(12) > 10^5. - _Robert Price_, Nov 13 2014
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 55...553.
Index entries for primes involving repunits
mathematica: Do[ If[ PrimeQ[50*(10^n - 1)/9 + 3], Print[n]], {n, 0, 5000}]Select[Range[0, 3000], PrimeQ[(5 10^(# + 1) - 23) / 9] &] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 14 2014 *)
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 10 2000
extensions: a(11) derived from A099416 by _Robert Price_, Nov 13 2014
